title: Large-Scale Career-Linked Project Management Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic project management concepts and practical workplace experience
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals who engage in online collaboration via personal devices alongside offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can create project management plans applicable to real-world work environments.
Learners can propose workplace problem-solving solutions using project risk management techniques.
Learners can compare Agile/Waterfall methodologies and select a management approach suited to their work characteristics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
